features: 【Premium Bedroom Rug】Luxuriate in the fluffy rugs, featuring a plush velvet rug surface, high-density sponge layer and secure non-slip bottom. Elevate your space with a shag rug that exudes opulence, resists shedding, and adds a touch of stylish style to your home.

【Ultra Soft and Comfort】Shaggy living room rug not only provide a soft walking surface but also excel in sound insulation, creating a serene environment. Shield yourself from the chill of bare floors and elevate your space with the unmatched coziness area rugs.

【Ideal Choice for Home Decor】Our 4x6Ft fluffy rugs are the ideal home decor choice, adored by people of all ages, including children and pets. Perfectly suited for the living room, bedroom or kids room, these throw rugs epitomize versatile allure in home decor.

【Care Recommendations】For a swift clean, we recommend using a low-power vacuum cleaner to delicately remove any debris from the shag rug. Alternatively, machine wash your fuzzy rug on a gentle cycle with mild detergent, avoid machine drying for longer rug life.

【Your Satisfaction is Our Priority】If you have any issues during use, please feel free to contact our customer service team at any time. This living room rugs typically bounce back to their original shape within 3-5 days of unpacking from the vacuum-sealed package.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Very fluffy! True to size. Really enjoying it! Great quality! This is the light grey colored one. It is a little darker than I expected.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 19, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute, soft, fluffy! Needs cleaning instructions.
reviews.reviewText: My daughter loves her new rug. It’s soft and plush! I also bought her best friend one. But when you wash it, it’s not the same plush and fluffiness. Also the size I bought it too big for my regular washer. So look up ways to clean it to keep the same look and fluffiness because I didn’t receive any cleaning instructions when I purchased.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 17, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Perfect for the foot of my bed. I wouldn’t recommend this for a high traffic area as it will get worn quickly. It is more like a throw than a traditional rug. Very nice for what I am using it for though.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 11, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Small but cute
reviews.reviewText: It’s super soft it’s a little smaller then I wanted but very cute

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Soft but not great with pets
reviews.reviewText: I loved this rug, but it didn’t last long in my household. This rug was incredibly soft and the squish factor was ok. I have 2 dogs and it did not hold up well with pets. As many dog and cats owners know, when they vomit it always has to be done on the rug or carpet, and this rug was no exception. Unfortunately, the rug stained very easily and was very difficult to clean by hand. I ended up having to try and wash it but it did not fit well in my apartment washer but I tried anyways. The vomit stained the rug and it was not coming out. It wasn’t too noticeable so I decided to just live with it. When it came time to vacuum I was worried it might ruin the rug, but having dogs it needed to be done. The vacuum had no issues getting what was on top, but any debris that was closer to the base of the rug was difficult to get out. Fast-forward another month and one of the dogs has an accident on the rug. I wash it and this time the stain isn’t coming out. I tried using my portable carpet cleaner and it made the stain worse. I decided to cut my loss and toss the rug. This would be a great rug for a low traffic area without pets/kids and if you have access to a larger than normal washer

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars It's a rug... It's not the worst I've ever had, but I think it looks like a rat
reviews.reviewText: So.. It's not expensive and it's a rug. It's functional. It covers the floor and is soft to the touch.It's also incredibly cheap looking. I equate it to a ragged rat. It's not super thick and doesn't look great to me.There are others that really love the way it looks, so it must be a preference thing. For the money, it's a great value if this is your style. Rugs are outrageously expensive and often do not look good in my opinion. This is a good way to get a large carpet for a reasonable price.I will use it in my rental property, but it's not because I like the way it looks. It's just functional and I don't have to worry about them destroying it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 11, 2021
reviews.reviewText: Excelente, me encanto es suave y igual ala foto

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Very Cheap Feeling Rug
reviews.reviewText: Would not buy again, very thin and cheap. Impossible to run a vacuum over it, will be tossing out and buying something else because would be impossible to return. They shrink rap it in plastic where it fit in a small box. Would not recommend!
